topics.body:
In regards to our milestone today
!http://i.imgur.com/DVpHAI3.gif!
But seriously, 5000 pages of randomposting? This just goes to show how much time we waste as a species. Not meant in a negative way though, it's been fun being here for a good 75-80% of it.

Now onwards to 10,000!!!

(I think this is also the longest running thread on this site as of now, so that's an accomplishment)

"@AppleJackFrost":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551738e163687217441c0600#post_551738e163687217441c0600
